ViewObject.Name: ODTempcrdLmtVVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
SELECT Extension_id FROM XX_CDH_CUST_ACCT_EXT_B WHERE CUST_ACCOUNT_ID = :1 AND N_EXT_ATTR4 = :2 AND N_EXT_ATTR1 = :3 AND ATTR_GROUP_ID = :4 AND( ( ( CAST(to_timestamp(:5,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff9') AS DATE) BETWEEN d_ext_attr1 AND d_ext_attr2 ) or (CAST(to_timestamp(:6,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff9') AS DATE) BETWEEN d_ext_attr1 AND d_ext_attr2) ) or (( d_ext_attr1 between (CAST(to_timestamp(:5,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff9') AS DATE)) and (CAST(to_timestamp(:6,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff9') AS DATE))) or ( d_ext_attr2 between (CAST(to_timestamp(:5,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff9') AS DATE)) and (CAST(to_timestamp(:6,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff9') AS DATE)))
) )
